title: Quantum Singularity: A Poetic Voyage Through Time and Space
description: Quantum Singularity is a voyage through time and space. This poetic journey crosses oceans, traverses other realms, gets lost in the past, and disappears into the future. Choose the right path; the path that leads to the corner of Cosmos and Infinity, and the way will never be lost.
author: Willow Croft
